Display_BW.Description: Display_BW is a display layer. Display_BW increases as number of layers increases

QOS.Description: Defines priority level for transactions. There are total 16 levels.

DDR.Description: DDR freq is RAM freq. Drain rate is directly prortional to DDR_freq

CAM_TYPE.Description: Broadly, there are total three types of camera: Single, Dual and Triple

RT%.Description: This will truncate x- axis which contains RT% BW and fascilitate in analysing point of inflection.

RT_BW.Description: This is sum total of Video_front_eng_BW and Display_BW.

buff_0_max_volume.Description: This is buffer01 max fill level

buff_1_max_volume.Description: This is buffer01 max fill level
